data.message: I desperately need to remove the administrator from my business page  This is my general manager, who set up the page originally, and I am an editor. Since she was the original administrator, I can't find any info as to how to do it, and I can't find any other venue than this that might be able to help.

replies.message: Hi Judy. Unfortunately, to change someone's role on your Page, you'll need to be an admin. Please consider reaching out to the current Page admin and asking them to make you an admin as well. Hope this helps. -Azaria
Hello! I write to you asking you to restoremy old account on Facebook. I just wantedto check if I could change the other year.Zawiasku with that I would like very muchto get my account back.
Please give back The girl next door page. Kris Lee
